com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
Class Sound

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Sound
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, Deleteable, OnDestroyListener, OnResumeListener, OnStopListener
public class Sound
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, OnResumeListener, OnStopListener, OnDestroyListener, Deleteable

Multimedia component that plays sounds and optionally vibrates. A sound is specified via filename. See also SoundPool.

Author:
sharon@google.com (Sharon Perl)

Method Detail

Source

public String Source()
Returns the sound's filename.

Source

public void Source(String path)
Sets the sound source

See MediaUtil.determineMediaSource(com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Form, java.lang.String) for information about what a path can be.

Parameters:
path - the path to the sound source

MinimumInterval

public int MinimumInterval()
Returns the minimum interval required between calls to Play(), in milliseconds. Once the sound starts playing, all further Play() calls will be ignored until the interval has elapsed.

Returns:
minimum interval in ms

MinimumInterval

public void MinimumInterval(int interval)
Specify the minimum interval required between calls to Play(), in milliseconds. Once the sound starts playing, all further Play() calls will be ignored until the interval has elapsed.

Parameters:
interval - minimum interval in ms

Play

public void Play()
Plays the sound.

public void Pause()
Pauses playing the sound if it is being played.

Resume

public void Resume()
Resumes playing the sound after a pause.

Stops playing the sound if it is being played.
